title: Get what you pay for
text:
I love the concept of the camera/treat and I got mine for $60. But it only stays connected for 5 mins so you constantly have to log back in. You get a 20 second message asking if you are “still there”. I wish the camera stayed until I shut it off. 
I’m considering getting a different camera that there is 2 way sound, zooming ability and recording. For the price I paid it is ok. 
The app runs ok; it is pixelated a lot and often the camera cannot connect.

title: App Needs To Be Updated
text: Decent app but needs to be updated to be compatible with the new iOS software.

title: Love being able to check on my animals!
text:
Updating my previous review as support resolved my issue. 

This is a great basic camera and I like being able to monitor my home when I’m away. I’d love if the camera could move to pan the room or zoom.

title: Good concept, app needs maintenance.
text: Love the concept of this, and the app used to work okay. But lately it will not connect to the Petzi unit without errors. I can no longer use the product. Wil not allow me to dispense treats, see the camera, play sound, etc. Please update the app or refund the purchase of the unit.

title: Hit the reset button behind the white cover!!!!
text: Delete the app and reinstall it if having problems. Also see reset button above!  Don’t chuck your device- work thru it.

title: Does not connect to WiFi
text:
Tried several times to get the camera connected to my WiFi without success. Always comes back with the “Could not connect” error.

It had worked about a year ago when I had tried with a previous version.

title: Not a great product
text: Our animal doesn’t respond to it and the treat dispenser is very loud often startling our pet. Overall, if I had purchased this with my own money, I’d return the product. Additionally, the app isn’t much of anything - weird pictures people share of their animals. You could do much better than what this product has to offer.

title: LOVE THIS THING
text: So easy to use and works great! My dogs love it! There’s a sound button to make the dogs come and a microphone so you can talk to them! If you’re a pet lover this is for you!

title: USED TO BE.... GOOD
text: Ever since wagz took over I can’t connect with my account and my treat cams (2). Updated app, went to the website to check my account but it is like I never existed. My cams are useless until you fix the problem! All the time invested in the pet social page and access to my treat cam..... gone! I will revise my review when you guys fix the problem(s)

title: Great but one flaw...
text: If you shake your phone, it gives treats. This is a horrible design flaw that makes it so you can't walk with the app open at the same time.

title: Really fun!
text: My cats love their treat cam. The app is designed well.   I wouldn’t see the point of it if I didn’t have the camera though.

title: App Won’t Connect to Camera
text: Love the camera and concept but the app constantly fails to connect. Resetting it DAILY used to fix that but now even that doesn’t help. Please fix this app or offer a refund so I can get a product that works.

title: App has difficulty reconnecting to the device
text: Device worked when I initially set everything up. Once I closed the app out and logged back into it I can’t get the camera to connect again. Plus the treats literally fly out of the device.

title: GREAT but one thing
text: I love love love love this thing and I even made a book abt it but u can only post one pet I have 3 but it’s ok I love it ❤️❤️❤️❤️

title: Will not work
text: Once it asks you to type in password for WiFi it says it has an issue connecting and to check my WiFi. There are no issues with my WiFi. Not happy

title: Good but Too Basic. Needs more.
text:
Have had this for a week. I got a new puppy and this has been a life saver for crate training. I can see if she is awake without getting out of bed and without worrying that I will wake her by checking on her. Best feature for me is Night Vision. It is not the best but you can see if your pets eyes are open but not much else. 
Things that would make it better: Two way communication!! It stinks that I can't hear anything. You can talk to your pet but you can't hear them.  I also wish you could zoom in the camera.  

The setup of the video and app were simple. You don't need any tech skills.I set it up in less than five minutes.  I think they could also do so much more with the App itself. A message or discussion board where owners can talk and ask questions would be helpful. I would like to also send a private messages to other users. 

I also tried PetCube Video Camera. PetCube you can two way communicate. So you can hear if your dog is crying or in distress. But a big thing it doesn't have is night vision. The apps and setup for both are very similar. The best feature that PetCube has that Petzi doesn't is that you can view other people's video feed with their permission . So you can play with someone cat or look at dogs in shelters.  You can have others exercise your pet with the laser or just admire. Both have similar video quality and similar in price.

title: Suddenly stops working
text: Device keeps losing connection and then won’t let me log back in.

title: Can’t Connect
text: Worked great for less than a week and now won’t connect to my phone. Camera keeps saying I need to retry and resetting it doesn’t help. Waste of money completely.

title: Does not connect
text: I recently moved and I reset and reconnected the Petzi to the new WiFi. I keep getting the message “did not connect.” I have an iPhone 7 and it use to connect perfectly.

title: Disappointed
text: The app keeps crashing when I try to connect my camera... so both the camera and the app are useless.

title: Disappointed
text: I purchased this for my two year old lab who has anxiety separation. It won’t allow me to connect during my lunch time with my dog.

title: Won’t connect to wi-fi
text: Checked password and connection with other device.  Not the issue.  Issue is the whoopsi I get when brand new pet toy won’t connect.

title: Be careful updating
text: Updated and now it won’t let me login and doesn’t recognize my email for forgot password. 🙄

title: Doesn’t connect
text: It won’t even connect to the WiFi.

title: Firmware
text: I just got this today and it has had the whoops firmware update for over an hour

title: Waste of money
text: Doesn’t even connect to the WiFi

title: Credentials invalid
text: App updated and now we can’t log in

title: Fun
text: This is so much fun!

title: Waiting for the update(s)
text:
I'm disappointed with the lag on the camera, the low resolution picture, and how hard it was to get set up. Hopefully these will be addressed. Won't crowdfund again--will wait for the bugs to work out first. 
Wish list for this app: real time good quality video and audio
Bonus: if it detects action (like dropcam) it could send a notification
Would be great to limit how many treats get shot out each time (don't want my pup to get obese and hang out by the box)
Also, are we supposed to be able to hear the action too? Or is that the next version?

title: Three Versions and It Still doesn’t Connect to PetziConnect.
text:
This company is terrible. They charge more than $150 for there PetziConnect and it is absolutely useless because in order to set it up you are supposed to connect to it over WiFi using their app. Well after the initial app and two upgrades it still will not connect.

The same thing happens and I have tried with two different WiFi Routers with two different iPhone 5, and the same thing happens. It shows that it has discovered the network, but when you put in the password to log in, the screen blanks out and goes back to the iOS home screen. when you open the app it is still sitting on the login screen, but you cannot do anything because the every time you try to put in the password the same crash happens. Without being able to log in, there is no way of controlling the PetziConnect, so it is basically a useless +$150 piece of junk.

title: A Huge Disappointment
text:
The idea behind this is you buy the device, then use the app to see/talk to your pets and give them a treat. You have to buy the Petzi to use the app, which is why the app is free.

However, the whole thing is very disappointing, especially since I had to wait well over a year to get the actual device. That in itself wouldn't be a huge deal if it actually worked as advertised. Two main problems. First, the app doesn't consistently work. Out of 12 tries, it worked twice. The other ten times it buffered, then closed with the error "session couldn't be started." Really? It took over a year to get the thing to market and it doesn't even work. Seems like these issues should have had been worked out before starting a funding campaign. 

Second, the camera resolution is simply awful. Beyond awful, especially considering the resolution on iPhone cameras these days. Not at all how it was advertised on the indigo go campaign. 

So in essence, I paid $100 for an over priced treat system that doesn't always kick out the treat. (The first time, the treats stayed in the little recess.) Of course, since the app rarely worked, I really didn't get to test the treats. 

Save your money. Don't buy the Petzi and the you won't have to worry about the app that doesn't work anyway.

title: App is crashing today!
text: App has been working up until today on my iPhone 6. Today it is crashing, as soon as I click on the camera button.

title: Works great
text: We got our Petzi after many of the things people complained about here had already been resolved, and we just love it. There are a couple of enhancements I'd love to see in the future: ability to access from multiple devices at the same time (for the camera at least), ability to record video and I'd probably eliminate the attempt at the Petzi social network. Other than those things it's great and we're pleased with our purchase.

title: Limited settings
text:
I'm a treat cam owner, and I would like to see some more customization options. For instance, I'm not interested in the social feed for my startup screen. This is not a feature I use and really only use the app to access my camera.
-Theme options would be nice... color is great but my only option is the current "neon rainbow" which would be great for kids, not so much for adults
-A toggle button for speaking through the device rather than "hold to speak"

Will update later as I use it more

title: It works, even with cats
text: Very cool! It took some playing with it to get the system working in clouding treating my cats, but it works beautifully. And if you don't have the box itself, the app is still worth it as a nice interface to see cool pictures of cats and dogs. And other animals too.

title: Everything works perfectly! The app and it the device
text: App working perfectly for me with and without unit.  Needs some tweaking but hey it's brand new and a young company. My hats off to these guys. This technology is out of this world and will only get better and better, a MUST BUY.

title: Poor quality, no response from customer service
text: Is the picture quality as bad for others as it is for me?  You can't even make out who or what is in front of the camera.  I wrote to the company but haven't received a response.  The app has very few settings, like being able to silence the "music" without also affecting the microphone.  So far I'm not very impressed.

title: Purr-fect for Pet Lovers!
text:
What an amazing app. I can now keep in touch with my pets while I am away from home. No more worrying about my fuzzy friends.

I can watch video, talk to and give out treats from anywhere.

Thankyou!!!

title: Great app and camera!!
text: This camera is great for our dog! The app is easy to use and we love checking in on our dog, giving him treats and even talking to him!

title: Help
text: The app worked great until the most recent update(9/15/16) since then it crashes on start up every time. iPhone 6 Plus iOS 10. Is anyone else having this issue?

title: Highly recommended product!
text:
I love this cam for my Maltese Jessie! She's still scared of it but she loves treats from Petzi! :) 
Will recommend it to everyone around me!

title: Works just fine!
text: Work as advertised!

title: Best device! Best app!
text:
Great app, works great! and great product!!! Don't miss out on one of these!!!!its a must buy! 

AMAZING!!!! I finally have a app for my dog phyto! Love this.

title: Crashing app fix
text: I had to uninstall and then reinstall the Petzi app, and now it works as usual

title: App doesn't work well
text: It is all ok except the resolution of the camera and the app closes when i try to take a photo via petziconnect, also I can't throw treats neither talk to my dogs because it doesn't have the buttons as it needs.

title: App was ok til update
text: It keeps crashing and won't even open, how am I supposed to check up on my dogs?! Please fix!!

title: App doesn't work
text: I registered the camera and activated the account via email. When I try to log in, the app closes right away.

title: Cool app
text: Very cool! Social network for pets AND controls PetziConnect!!

title: Is there another animal treat cam out there?!
text: Do not like that when I purchased this product off amazon that it was defunct and I’m unable to setup this camera. Bought brand new, and something about the firmware update was not supported so I have a box of treats now with a lens that I just use as a treat jar! I’ve learned my lesson! Nest cam it is to spy on the lil rascals, or a teddy bear camera!

title: Overall does what it is supposed to do!
text:
UPDATE A FEW MONTHS LATER: 11-11-15
The new update makes the video lag HORRIBLY! It was bearable before but now it's awful! I see green spots on the bottom while it distorts the image of my dog due to an awful lag! I dispense a treat even when I am home to see how late the video is and it is very slow! I am very disappointed, which is why I am changing my review from 4 stars to 2. I loved it when I first bought it, but the slowness and bad video quality is driving me crazy. I bought this to see my dogs and I'm lucky if I get a few peeks at them in between the lag/distortions! What a shame! Won't be recommending anytime soon. Bad job, Petzi.
-----------

I bought the camera off Amazon a few weeks ago. You need the camera to use the app because the purpose is to see your pets and give them treats and talk to them. Installation was a bit difficult for me because it kept getting disconnected but it seems to work OK now. The camera quality is pretty good and it lets me dispense treats for my fur babies! Overall I am satisfied with the camera and the app. :)

title: Fantastic!! Love it!!!!
text:
If you love animals, this is great!!!! It's the best thing I've bought for my pets! 
I can see them and treat them when I am out, and then take pictures to post on the social site. 
Worked great from the 
set-up, and the pets love it too.......especially my Cavalier King Charles!
Best buy ever 🐶🐱🐾
